description: To ensure successful authentication after installing the October 2023 updates, it is crucial to remove any reliance on the registry subkey 'krbtgtfullpacsignature.' Instead, adhere to the new PAC signatures required for service tickets, as non-compliance will lead to denied authentication. As of October 10, 2023, Windows updates fully enforce this change, rendering previous registry-based configurations ineffective. Administrative actions should focus on aligning systems with the updated authentication protocols, confirming that all service tickets utilize the new PAC signatures to maintain access. It is recommended to review all configuration settings to comply with these updates and avoid disruptions in service ticket processing.
